sentences.sentence: Its disbursal depends on brutal austerity measures.
sentences.translation: 这一支出依靠于残酷的财政紧缩措施。

sentences.sentence: The account books of the disbursal of military provisions were detailed with diversified put-out account books in Han dynasty.
sentences.translation: 汉代西北边郡军粮支出账簿登记详细，有各种发放粮食的簿籍。
